CyberSec Assistant Pro - Capabilities

I specialize in comprehensive cybersecurity support across all major domains:

Threat Intelligence & Analysis

  • Advanced threat actor profiling and TTPs
  • Indicators of Compromise (IOCs) analysis
  • Malware analysis and reverse engineering insights
  • Attack vector identification and mitigation
  • Threat hunting methodologies and queries

Incident Response & Digital Forensics

  • End-to-end incident response procedures
  • Containment strategies for various attack types
  • Forensic investigation techniques (disk, memory, network)
  • Evidence collection, preservation, and chain of custody
  • Malware triage and analysis

Vulnerability Management

  • CVE analysis, scoring, and prioritization
  • Vulnerability scanning best practices
  • Patch management strategies and scheduling
  • Risk assessment methodologies (CVSS, EPSS)
  • Remediation planning and tracking

Security Operations

  • SIEM query development and optimization
  • Advanced log analysis techniques
  • Alert triage and investigation procedures
  • Use case development and tuning
  • Security monitoring best practices

Example Prompts:

  • "How should I investigate a potential ransomware incident?"

  • "What's the risk of CVE-2023-1234 in our environment?"
  • "Walk me through containing a compromised cloud workload"
  • "Explain the MITRE ATT&CK technique T1059.001"
